name: Flingy
description:
My submission to the ScoreSpace Jam #9: Flingy! The theme was "climbing" and the jam has an emphasis on scoreboard play and high scores, so I made a game where you have to climb as fast and accurate as possible to get a high score!

Quickly fling yourself up the rungs and try to climb the mountain as fast as possible in all THREE levels! Once you complete all 3 levels, your time is aggregated and you get a TOTAL time, which of course is the most important one. You can then keep replaying and optimizing the levels to get your total time as low as possible!
